parse.title: List of institutions accredited by AMBA

text.*:
The Association of MBAs (AMBA) has accredited MBA, DBA and MBM programmes at 257 graduate business schools in 54 countries and territories (as of July 2018). Some of the accredited institutions offer programs in a further 33 countries, which expands AMBA's global presence to 85 countries. The list of 54 countries/territories below shows only the home countries of the 257 accredited business schools.[1]
